protein.general_function: Involved in cellular iron ion homeostasis
protein.specific_function: Has strong antimicrobial activity against E.coli ML35P N.cinerea and weaker against S.epidermidis, S.aureus and group b streptococcus bacteria. Active against the fungus C.albicans. No activity against P.aeruginosa

go_class.description: cellular di-, tri-valent inorganic cation homeostasis
